title: Manchester City vs Aston Villa, Premier League: live score and latest updates
text:
I loved watching John McGinn when he was in Scotland and Celtic must be gutted they didn't get the transfer over the line. McGinn is probably worth about £30-40million at the moment, a box-to-box midfielder who has everything - he's a weird sort of player, running everywhere all of the time, sneaking up into positions to score and assist despite being in his own half seconds before. He's always involved but manages to ghost into places.

"I don't take myself too seriously. The amount of players who have called me ugly on the park... [laughs]".
description: I loved watching John McGinn when he was in Scotland and Celtic must be gutted they didn't get the transfer over the line.
